entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
